item.title: Deloitte Responds After Ransomware Group Claims Data Theft
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Deloitte has issued a response after the Brain Cipher ransomware group claimed to have stolen over 1 Tb of information belonging to the company.

The post Deloitte Responds After Ransomware Group Claims Data Theft appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Industry Moves for the week of December 9, 2024 - SecurityWeek
item.description: Explore industry moves and significant changes in the industry for the week of December 9, 2024. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and shifts.

item.title: Eight Suspected Phishers Arrested in Belgium, Netherlands
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Belgian and Dutch authorities arrested eight individuals for their alleged involvement in phishing, online scams, and money laundering operations.

The post Eight Suspected Phishers Arrested in Belgium, Netherlands appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Anna Jaques Hospital Data Breach Impacts 316,000 People
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Anna Jaques Hospital says the personal information of over 316,000 individuals was compromised in a year-old data breach.

The post Anna Jaques Hospital Data Breach Impacts 316,000 People appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: The EU Makes an Urgent TikTok Inquiry on Russia’s Role in Romanian Election Turmoil
item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.description:
EU sent TikTok an urgent request for more information about Romanian intelligence files suggesting that Russia coordinated influencers to promote a candidate who became the surprise front-runner in presidential election.

The post The EU Makes an Urgent TikTok Inquiry on Russia’s Role in Romanian Election Turmoil appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: In Other News: Cloudflare Abuse, UK and EU Cybersecurity Reports, FBI Gen-AI Alert
item.dc:creator: SecurityWeek News
item.description:
Noteworthy stories that might have slipped under the radar: ENISA and NCSC release cybersecurity reports, abuse of Cloudflare services, FBI warns of gen-AI enabling fraud.Â 

The post In Other News: Cloudflare Abuse, UK and EU Cybersecurity Reports, FBI Gen-AI Alert appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Ethyca Raises $10 Million for Data Privacy Platform
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Data privacy solutions provider Ethyca has raised $10 million in a funding round led by Aspenwood Ventures and AVP.

The post Ethyca Raises $10 Million for Data Privacy Platform appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: SonicWall Patches 6 Vulnerabilities in Secure Access Gateway
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
SonicWall has released patches for multiple high-severity flaws in the SMA100 SSL-VPN secure access gateway.

The post SonicWall Patches 6 Vulnerabilities in Secure Access Gateway appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Atrium Health Data Breach Impacts 585,000 People
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Atrium Health has notified the HHS of a data breach impacting 585,000 individuals, and the incident may be related to online tracking.

The post Atrium Health Data Breach Impacts 585,000 People appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Google Open Sources Security Patch Validation Tool for Android
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Google has announced the open source availability of Vanir, a patch validation tool for Android platform developers.

The post Google Open Sources Security Patch Validation Tool for Android appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: PoC Exploit Published for Unpatched Mitel MiCollab Vulnerability
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
WatchTowr has published proof-of-concept (PoC) code for an unpatched vulnerability in the Mitel MiCollab enterprise collaboration platform.

The post PoC Exploit Published for Unpatched Mitel MiCollab Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.
